1124:5: yathoktamāryatathāgataguhyasūtre-yāni ca tāni mahānagareṣu mahāśmaśānāni bhavantyanekaprāṇiśatasahastrākīrṇāni,
1124:6: tatrāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāntamātmabhāvaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagatamupadarśayati |
1124:7: tatra te tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvā yāvadarthaṃ māsaṃ paribhujya āyuḥparyante mṛtāḥ kālagatāḥ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante |
1124:10: yena dīrgharātramevaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam- ye me mṛtasya kālagatasya māsaṃ paribhuñjīran,
1124:11: sa eva teṣāṃ heturbhavet svargotpattaye yāvatparinirvāṇāya tasya śīlavataḥ |
1124:14: punaratraivoktam- sa dharmakāyaprabhāvito darśanenāpi sattvānāmarthaṃ karoti |
1124:16: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate jīvakena vaidyarājena sarvabhaiṣajyāni samudānīya bhaiṣajyatarusaṃhatimayaṃ dārikārūpaṃ [kṛtaṃ] prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sukṛtaṃ suniṣṭhitaṃ suparikarmakṛtam |
1124:17: sā āgacchati gacchati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati |
1124:18: tatra ye āgacchantyāturā mahātmāno rājāno vā rājamātrā vā śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājāno vā,
1124:19: tān sa jīvako vaidyarājastayā bhaiṣajyadārikayā sārdhaṃ saṃyojayati |
1124:22: paśya śāntamate jīvakasya vaidyarājasya laukikavyādhicikitsājñānaṃ yadyanyeṣāṃ vaidyānāṃ saṃvidyate |
1124:23: evameva śāntamate tasya dharmakāyaprabhāvitasya bodhisattvasya yāvantaḥ sattvāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā rāgadoṣamohasaṃtaptāḥ kāyaṃ spṛśanti,
1124:25: vigatasaṃtāpaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjānanti yadidaṃ tasyaiva bodhisattvasya pūrvapraṇidhānasupariśuddhatvāt |
1124:28: tṛṇacchannaṃ yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naighate |
1124:33: tatra pāpaśodhanaṃ caturdharmakasūtre deśitam- caturbhirmaitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavati |
1124:40: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvāpyakuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇyatyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ |
1124:44: ebhirmaitreyaḥ caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpamabhibhavatīti ||
1124:49: ye ca daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dvipadottamāḥ ||
1124:50: yacca me pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇam |
1124:53: kuśalaṃ cāprajānatā yatta pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
1124:68: pānārtha bhojanārthaṃ ca vastrārthaṃ strīṣu hetunā |
1124:72: yattu buddheṣu dharmeṣu śrāvakeṣu tathaiva ca |
1124:84: yattu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā kalpaśateṣu ca |
1124:87: yatra yatra cariṣyāmi na cāsti me balaṃ kkacit ||
1124:88: sarve kāruṇikā buddhāḥ sarve bhayaharā jage |
1124:89: atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu mocayantu ca māṃ bhayāt ||
1124:92: sarva pāpaṃ deśayāmi yattu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā |
1124:93: yacca etarhi me pāpaṃ tatsarvaṃ deśayāmyaham ||
1124:96: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturbidham |
1124:102: bhavagati saṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yanme kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam |
1124:104: deśayāmi ca tatpāpaṃ yanmayā saṃcitaṃ janmasaṃkaṭe vividhaiḥ kāyapracārasaṃkaṭairbhavasaṃkaṭalokasaṃkaṭe cāpalacalacittasaṃkaṭe mūrkhabālakṛtakleśasaṃkaṭe |
1124:108: viśeṣatastu bodhisattvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ ladhvīnāṃ deśanā āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmuktā- kā punargurvī mūlāpattiḥ?
1124:110: sacedupāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅganadīvālikopamā rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattīrāpadyeta,
1124:117: tatra upāle yaḥ kleśaḥ sattvasaṃgrahāya saṃvartate,
1124:118: na tatra bodhisattvasya chalaṃ na bhayam |
1124:120: tasmāttarhi tvāmupāle yāḥ kāścana rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattayaḥ,
1124:125: yasmādanantaramāha- tatra upāle ye'nupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati |
1124:126: ye punarupāyakuśalā bodhisattvāste dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya iti ||
1124:129: ubhayathā hi sattvatyāgo bhavati- kevalaprajñayā duḥkhaśūnyatāvabodhāt,
1124:132: yaduktamupāyakauśalyasūtre- tadyathā kulaputra mantravidyādharaḥ puruṣo rājñā pañcapāśakena bandhanena baddhaḥ syāt |
1124:135: evameva kulaputra upāyakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ pañcamiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati,
1124:138: tadā prajñābalādhīnena ekena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmaloka upapadyata iti ||
1124:142: parārthasiddhiṃ vā svārthādgurutarāmadhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayāpi paramanuśāsya anutāpapūrvakamāyatyāṃ saṃvaramutpadyate |
1124:147: tathāpi bodhisattvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ sattvārthānubandhasya hāniḥ syāt ||
1124:151: nivāryamāṇaśca yadi hitakāmo bodhisattvo pratighaṃ labheta saṃbodhisattvaḥ,
1124:161: yathoktaṃ candrapradīpasūtre- tadyathāpi nāma ānanda kaścideva puruṣo'dhastātpādatalamādāya yāvanmūrdhanyādīpto bhavet saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūtaḥ,
1124:162: taṃ kaścivade puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vadet- ehi tvaṃ moḥ puruṣa anirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcamiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti |
1124:163: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda api tu sa puruṣo'nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcamiḥ kāmaguṇai.......krīḍeta rametparicaret?
1124:165: bhagavānāha- krīḍeta ānanda sa puruṣo rametparicaretparikalpamupādāya aparinirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcamiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ?
1124:166: na tvevaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya sattvān tribhirapāyairduḥkhitān dṛṣṭā daridrānabhūt saumanasyaṃ vā cittaprasādo veti vistaraḥ ||
1124:167: loke'pi putre śūlamāropyamāṇe paśyatormātāpitrorna saukhyasaṅgo dṛṣṭaḥ svānurūpakṛpāvaśāt pracchannastarhi sasvāmikāsu niḥsvāmikasu vā kuladharmadhvajarakṣitāsu kāmamithyācāro na syāt |
1124:177: kiṃ cāpyahamidaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syām,
1124:181: iti hi kulaputra jyotirmāṇavakaḥ paścānmukho nivartya tāṃ striyaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvaivamāha- uttiṣṭha magini yathākāmakaraṇīyaste bhavāmīti |
1124:183: so'haṃ kulaputra mahākāruṇyacittotpādenetvareṇa kāmopasaṃhitena daśakalpasahastrāṇi paścānmukhamakārṣam |
1124:186: punaratraivāha- yadi bodhisattva ekasya sattvasya kuśalamūlaṃ saṃjanayettathārūpāṃ cāpattimāpadyeta yathārūpayā āpattyā āpannayā kalpaśatasahastraṃ niraye pacyeta,
1124:187: utsoḍhavyameva bhagavan bodhisattvenāpattimāpattuṃ tacca nairayikaṃ duḥkham |
1124:188: na tveva tasyaikasya sattvasya kuśalaṃ parityaktumiti ||
1124:190: sa itaḥ pratisaṃśikṣate- na mayaimiḥ skandhaiḥ parinirvāpayitavyam |
1124:191: mayā punarevaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ- aparāntakoṭiḥ saṃsaritavyā sattvānāṃ paripācanahetoriti |
1124:193: yathā yathā saṃsariṣyāmi tathā tathā sattvān paripācayiṣyāmi |
1124:196: sacetkulaputra pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parikalpamādāya sarvāścatastro mūlāpattīratikramet,
1124:201: ayaṃ ca rāge guṇo yadbodhisattve rāgamutpādya sugatirlabhyate na tu krodhena |
1124:202: yathoktamupāyakauśalyasūtre priyaṃkare bodhisattve raktā[dha] vyottarāṃ dārikāmadhikṛtya-
1124:203: priyaṃkarasya praṇidheḥ punaḥ punaryā istri prekṣeta sarāgacittā |
1124:204: sā istribhāvaṃ parivarjayitvā puruṣo bhavet yādṛgudārasattvaḥ ||
1124:205: paśyasva ānanda guṇāsya īdṛśāḥ yenānyasattvā nirayaṃ vrajanti |
1124:206: tenaiva śūreṣu janitva rāgaṃ gacchanti svarga puruṣatvameva ca |peyālaṃ ||
1124:207: bhaiṣajyarājeṣu mahāyaśeṣu ko bodhisattveṣu janayeta dveṣam |
1124:208: yeṣāṃ kileśo'pi sukhasya dāyakaḥ kiṃ vā punaryastān satkareyāḥ ||iti||
1124:210: upāyakauśalyasūtre ca gaṇikāvatkṛtārtho bodhisattvo nirapekṣastaṃ sattvaṃ tyajatīti vistareṇoktam ||
1124:214: uktaṃ hyupāliparipṛcchāyām- bodhisattvānāṃ śāriputra dvemahāsāvadye āpattī |
1124:216: tatra śāriputra prathamā āpattirdaśavarge ṛjukena deśayitavyā |
1124:218: striyā hastagrahaṇaṃ cakṣurdarśanam duṣṭacittāpattirekapudgalasya dvayorvā śāriputra tāṃ gurvī darśayet |
1124:220: tathā anyāścāpattayo bodhisattvena pañcatriśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike rātriṃdivaṃ ekākinā gurbyo deśayitavyāḥ ||
1124:259: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti ghriyante yāpayanti,
1124:261: yanmayā asyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣu anavarāgre jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syātkāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet,
1124:262: staupikaṃ vā sāṃdhikaṃ vā dravyamapahṛtaṃ syāt,
1124:263: hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vā anumoditaṃ bhavet |
1124:264: pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vā anumoditāni bhaveyuḥ |
1124:266: pare vā samādāpitāḥ syurvartamānā vā anumoditā bhaveyuryena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto'haṃ nirayaṃ va gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveghūpapadyeyamindriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vopagṛhṇīyāṃ buddhotpādaṃ vā virāgayeyam,
1124:267: tatsarvaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatāmagrataḥ pratideśayāmi,
1124:270: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yanmayā asyāṃ jātāvanyāsu vā jātiṣvanavarāgre vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavedantaśastiryagyonigatāyāpyālopaḥ,
1124:271: śīlaṃ vā rakṣitaṃ bhavedyacca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlam,
1124:275: tatsarvamaikadhyaṃ piṇḍayitvā tulayittvā abhisaṃkṣipya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā pariṇāmanayā yathā pariṇāmitamatītairbuddhairbhagavadbhiryathā pariṇāmayiṣyatyanāgatā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
1124:276: yathā pariṇāmayantietarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
1124:289: iti hi śāriputra bodhisatvenemān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatāthāgatānugatairmanasikāraiḥ pāpaśuddhiḥ kāryā |
1124:290: tasyaivaṃ sarvapāpaviśuddhasya tatra ca buddhā bhagavanto mukhānyupadarśayanti sattvavimokṣārthameva |
1124:294: yadbodhisattvasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanenāpattikaukṛtyānniḥsarati samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate ||
1124:298: yathā vajracchedikāyāmuktam- ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imānevaṃrūpān sūtrāntānudgahīṣyanti yāvatparyavāṣsyanti,
1124:301: yāni teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtānyapāyasaṃvartanīyāni,
1124:302: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭa eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantīti ||
1124:303: śūnyatādhimuktayā'pi pāpaśuddhirbhavati tathāgatakoṣasūtre vacanāt- yaḥ kāśyapa pitā casyātpratyekabuddhaśca,
1124:307: idamagraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yaduta mātā syādarhantīṃ ca |
1124:316: sacetkāśyapa ekasattva ebhirevaṃmahāsāvadyairdaśabhirakuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet,
1124:317: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanāmavataret - nātra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo va pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate,
1124:326: trisamayarāje'pi pāpapratipakṣasamudācāra uktaḥ - akṣiṇī nimīlya buddhabodhisattvālambanacittaḥ śatākṣaramaṣṭasahastraṃ japet |
1124:334: tathāgatabimbaparivarte'pi pratipakṣasamudācāra uktaḥ- tadyathā puruṣo mīḍhāvaliptaḥ sudhautasnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhairvilipyeta,
1124:337: yo'pi daśākuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatastathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet,
1124:338: tasyāpi tatpāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya,
1124:340: puṣpakūṭadhāraṇyāmapyuktam-yaśca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahastraṃ vā varṣaśatasahastraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānairupatiṣṭheta,
1124:346: upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryādāttamanāḥ,
1124:347: ekakramavyatihāraṃ vātikramya vācaṃ bhāṣate namastasmai buddhāya bhagavata itimātre atra siṃhavikrīḍita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā yadasau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahastraṃ va durgativinipātaṃ gacchet,
1124:352: ye punarabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti,
1124:356: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuryathāvibhavataśca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ,
1124:358: atha bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma- śraddadhāsi tvamānanda pattīyasi,
1124:359: yadahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi |
1124:360: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare?
1124:361: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat- na bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu |
1124:367: kiṃ tu bhadanta bhagavan santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ,
1124:369: teṣāmevaṃ bhavati- kathamidaṃ nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti?
1124:374: bhagavānāha- asthānamānanda anavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe,
1124:379: abhūmiścātra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāniti ||
1124:380: atraiva coktam- ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatamupavāsamupavasanti,
1124:381: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti,
1124:382: yeṣāmevamabhiprāyaḥ evaṃ praṇidhānam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema,
1124:384: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
1124:385: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye'ṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhayā āgatya mārgamupadarśayanti |
1124:388: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ tatpūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate |
1124:390: te tataścyutvā iha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti caturdvīpeścarāścakravartinaḥ |
1124:397: tatraivoktam- yena ca punarmātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati udgṛhītaṃ vā,
1124:398: sa tasya paścimo matṛgrāmabhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya iti ||
1124:402: ya eṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ nāmagheyaṃ tu dhārayet |
1124:408: sa tena kuśalamūlena karmavipākena yatpūrvāntakoṭipañcagaticakrārūḍhena saṃsāranadyudyātena prāṇātipātahetunā kāyavāṅyanasā karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dharmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syātkāritaṃ vā anumoditaṃ syāt,
1124:413: yāvat punaraparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisattvo yāvajjīvamadattādānātprativirato bhavati,
1124:416: sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvadadattādānahetukaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvadaśeṣamavipākaṃ kuruta iti || peyālaṃ ||
1124:417: evaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣākuśalaghātakāstatra paṭhayante |
1124:418: tathā candrapradīpasūtre'pi vyāpādaviratyā sarvapāpakṣayaḥ śrūyate | yathāha-
1124:421: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yanmayā purime kṛtam |
1124:422: anyeṣu bodhisattveṣu vyāpādo janito mayā || iti ||
1124:426: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatim |
1124:427: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāllabhanti te ||
1124:434: na ca tatra tatpalaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahastreṇa paryādātum,
1124:436: evamevaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti |
1124:437: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā |
1124:438: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate,
1124:441: evamevaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo yādṛśe sattvāśaye gahane'vidyātamondhakārānugate praveśyate,
1124:446: āryopāliparipṛcchāyāmapyuktam- iha upāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisattvaḥ sacetpūrvāhṇakālasamaye āpattimāpadyate,
1124:453: evaṃ hyupāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānām |
1124:457: naṣṭaḥ śrāvakasya pudgalasya śīlaskandho veditavyaḥ || iti||
